name: TimeZone

methods.name: getDisplayName
methods.description: Returns this time zone’s display name.

methods.name: getOffset
methods.description: Returns the time zone offset, in milliseconds, of the specified date to the GMT time zone.

params.name: date
params.description: The date argument is the date and time to evaluate.

methods.name: getTimeZone
methods.description: Returns the time zone corresponding to the specified time zone ID.

params.name: timeZoneIdString
params.description: The time zone values you can use for the Id argument are any valid time zone values that the Java TimeZone class supports.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns the string representation of this time zone.

description: Represents a time zone. Contains methods for creating a new time zone and obtaining time zone properties, such as the time zone ID, offset, and display name.
